title.narrative: Social and Economic Empowerment for Slum-Dweller Youths in Freetown, Sierra Leone (SEESDY)

description.narrative:
Social and Economic Empowerment for Slum-Dweller Youths in Freetown, Sierra Leone (SEESDY). Cumulative: October, 2019 – December 2020 (Quarter 2 Year 3 inclusive). Number of Beneficiaries:
1) Oct, 2019 to June, 2020 (9-month Cumulative figure) = 397.
2) July to December 2020 (6-month Cumulative figure) = 330. Total = 727. 3) October to December 2020 (3-month figure) = 270 Location: Palmoronkoh Slum Community, East of Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa.
1. Number of apprenticeship trainees: Male: 43, Female: 13, PWD: 7 (Female 6, Male 1), Total: 56
1a. Apprenticeship Courses: - Tailoring: Male: 3, Female: 10, PWD: 5 (Male 1, Female 4) Total: 13) - Hair dressing: Female: 3, PWD: 2; Total: 3. - Electrical Installation: Male: 0, Total: 0. - Motor Mechanics: Male: 22, Total:22. - Welding: Male: 11, Total: 11. - Carpentry: Male: 2, Total 2. - Masonry: Male: 2, Total: 2. - Plumbing: Male: 2, Total: 2. - Electrical Installation: Male: 2, Total: 2.
2. Number of vocational trainees: Female: 61; PWD 5; Total: 61. 2a. Vocational Training courses: - Tailoring: Female: 26, Total: 26. PWD 2. - Catering: Female: 21, Total: 21 PWD 3. - Hair dressing: Female: 14, Total: 14.
3. Advocacy/lobbying; Rights/Gender; Empowerment: Male: 20, Female: 40, Total: 60. 4. Social empowerment in SGBV, Equity and Advocacy/lobbing: Male: 282, Female: 478, Total: 760. Covid-19 Rapid Response Project Sierra Leone Cumulative: Sept, 2020 – December, 2020. 1. Number of Beneficiaries: a) 3rd Sept. 2020 (1 month Cumulative figure) = 4,315. b) 1st.Oct.2020 to 30th. December,2020 (Two month cumulative= 7,093. Total = 11,408 (5,134 M, 6,274 F; PWD - 10M, 5F) 2. Number of people in the target 3 communities that are now aware of and can inform others about COVID 19 as a result of this project (Awareness Beneficiaries) = 1,674 (753 M/921 F). 3. Number that now know and can prevent preventive and inform others about Covid 19 preventive measures (Prevention Beneficiaries) = 4,774 (2,148 M/2,626 F). Number of vulnerable people that received water and food = 500 (225 M/275 F). 4. Number of Attendees at a Community talk show and jingle in the three communities of the project = 4,500 (2,025 Male/2,475 Female).
